mecard.customer

Interface FormattedTable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BImportTable, FlatTable

    public interface FormattedTable

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getData

        java.lang.String getData()
        Creates matching.
        Returns:
        properly formatted bimport data string for the table this represents.

      • getHeader

        java.lang.String getHeader()
        Returns:
        properly formatted bimport header string for the table this represents.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        name of the formatted table.

      • getValue

        java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the value associated with this key.
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        the value associated with this key, or an empty string if the key is not present.

      • setValue

        boolean setValue(java.lang.String key,
               java.lang.String value)
        Adds or changes an a key in the table entry. If the key exists then the value for that key is updated and the return result is true. If the key didn't exist, the key value pair are added, but the return value is false. The return value is false if either the key of value is null, and no changes are made to the table.
        Parameters:
        key -
        value -
        Returns:
        true if a key was found and updated and false if the key or value could not be added because they were null, or the key and value pair did not exist when they were added.
